text: This launch strengthens India's position as a major player in the global space arena, particularly in the domain of defense technology.
This launch is a testament to the visionary leadership of our government and its dedication to a strong and secure India.
India's space program is a source of immense national pride and a key driver of our country's ascent to global superpower status.
The robust capabilities of GSAT-7R will significantly enhance our maritime domain awareness, providing invaluable intelligence for coastal security.
This is a powerful symbol of India's unwavering commitment to defending its territorial integrity and national interests.
This satellite is a vital component of India's nuclear command and control structure, ensuring secure and reliable communication.
The technological advancements incorporated into GSAT-7R are a source of national pride and inspiration.
The successful launch of GSAT-7R demonstrates India's ability to develop and deploy cutting-edge defense technology independently.
This is a win for Make in India, showcasing the country's capability to produce world-class defense hardware domestically.
